attributes.action: EU referendum poll results doesn’t represent  majority warranting 2nd referendum
attributes.additional_details:
This EU referendum poll result are invalid as it doesn’t represent the views of majority of our population. 
Reasons:
1.	Only 36 % of total population voted out (51.9/70)
2.	Poll turn out was affected by bad weather.
3.	Confusion due to false claims by camps.
4.	16-17 year olds had no chance to say.
There should be second EU referendum in 6 months to make an informed choice.
attributes.background:
EU referendum poll result are invalid as it doesn’t represent the views of  majority.
Reasons:1.36 % of total population voted out (51.9/70) 2.Affected by bad weather 3.False claims by both camps 4.16-17 year olds had no say
There should be 2nd EU referendum in 6 months to make informed choice.
